item.title: API
item.description: GET /api/all Returns all hosts in json. GET /api/history Returns all History. Not recommended, the output can be a lot. GET /api/history/:mac/:date Returns only history of a device with this mac filtered by date. date format can be anything from 2 to 2025-07 to 2025-07-26. GET /api/history/:mac?num=20 Returns only last 20 lines of history of a device with this mac. GET /api/host/:id Returns host with this id in json. GET /api/port/:addr/:port Gets state of one port of addr. Returns true if port is open or false otherwise. Request example:
